JobFullDesc: Join Facebook’s human resources organization, People@, as a People Strategy and Execution Partner on our People Planning and Strategy team to support our most complex and cross-functional initiatives. This team partners with leaders across People@ and Facebook to tackle challenging, high velocity work. This position supports cross-functional, agile teams acting in diverse capacities as a project manager - focusing on the details required for brilliant execution. Those in this role are expected to leverage experiences and build proficiency across different HR domains, agile project management, stakeholder management, and change enablement. This role is hands-on, execution-focused; supporting strategic and operational projects to move forward at rapid speed while keeping information documented and stakeholders aligned. It requires a focus on details, documentation, and structure. Experience with issue-based problem solving, HR leading practices, and influencing will help make someone in this role successful.
